issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
When reregistering a user-api the cloud fails the request as follows:

{noformat}
source /root/eucarc && //usr/sbin/euca_conf  --register-service -T user-api -H 10.111.5.164 -N API_10.111.5.164 --no-scp --no-rsync --no-sync ----
[10.111.5.164] out: STDOUT: error: registration failed
[10.111.5.164] out: ERROR	Registering  arn:euca:bootstrap:API_10.111.5.164:user-api:API_10.111.5.164/  failed because of  Unable to register more than one service in a partition for component type: user-api
[10.111.5.164] out: STDERR: WARN: Eucalyptus URL is not configured.
{noformat}
fields.summary: User API Service registration should be idempotent

comments.body: Registration of user facing services, including the user-api service group is now idempotent.

Fix Verified.

Register user-api is now idempotent.

This is Euca 4.2.0, however, version bump has not happened yet.
{code}
Installed Packages
Name        : eucalyptus
Arch        : x86_64
Version     : 4.1.1
Release     : 0.0.23217.415.20150406git7fe88c1.el6
{code}

Output of describe services showing UFS services already registered and enabled for {{10.111.5.154}} then registering 2 more times without error. Finally, showing the service remains enabled
